observation: Davis Virtual Assistance is a book coach and marketing expert.  Menu Home About Me How I Work Author Services Publisher Services Book Marketing Podcast Booking Project Do It Yourself Podcast Booking Podcast Articles Client List Contact “Bonnie Davis, thank you, thank you, thank you for being a light through the – Pam Ellinger Dixon, Ph.D., Author of Hope is On the Way: “ Photo by Javier Martínez Unsplash Do you have the germ of  an idea for a non-fiction book, but you just don’t know how to get it out of your head? Do you have the finished manuscript in your hands but don’t know how to get it into the hands of readers?  If so, Bonnie Davis, the Non-Fiction Book Coach and Marketing Expert is the person you need. Help you navigate the world of book publishing and marketing step by step. Assist you with writing and editing your book. Provide help with layout and design. Yes, that includes your book cover. She customizes every project to the individual author and book. She has a strong team of experts that work with her. She is committed to finding and reaching your ideal readers. bonnie@davisvirtualassistance.com Pages Copyright © Pinnacle Themes
